In England, in the seven days to 12 August, there were 40,027 new confirmed cases (70.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 August, there were 50,823 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (10,796 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 August is 19,780,734 (34,979.1 cases per 100,000 population).
